meanings.definition: a person who is learning a subject or skill
meanings.sent1: The young learner was eager to absorb new knowledge in class.
meanings.sent2: Every student in the school is a learner, always gaining new skills.
meanings.sent3: The little learner tried to juggle five oranges at once during the circus workshop.
meanings.sent4: She was a fast learner, picking up the dance routine in just one practice.
meanings.sent5: The curious learner explored the forest, discovering new plants and animals.

meanings.definition: one who learns or gains knowledge
meanings.sent1: The online course attracted many eager learners looking to expand their knowledge.
meanings.sent2: As a lifelong learner, she believed in constantly seeking new information.
meanings.sent3: The learner accidentally spilled ink on the important document, trying to read it upside down.
meanings.sent4: He was a quick learner, grasping complex concepts with ease.
meanings.sent5: The young learner's eyes sparkled with excitement as she uncovered the hidden treasure.
